page.title: 08Mining Fullers Earth
page.content: {Fullers Earth}has been dug in the area for over 4OO years.The Fullers Earth is found beneath red sand strongly impregnated with iron,then, beneath a thin stratum of clay is found a purer stratum of Fullers Earth.Products made using the Fullers Earth include:animal feeds, fertilisers,pet litter granules,seed pelletisation,sodium-activated Fullers Earth for foundry use,plus many others.It's original use was to clean wool and cotton.The company responsible for the digging makes good the land so that no unsightly scars are left and many new trees have been planted. We went to the quarry and were told that they made cat litter and sold one third of it to Sweden.Water was being drained off.Carol found a sea anemone. {Charles.
